attributes.action: PUT FORWARD JOANNA LUMLEY TO BE MADE A DAME
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I WOULD LIKE JOANNA LUMLEY, FOR HER UNTIRING WORK FOR THE GHURKAS AND MANY OTHER CAUSES, TO BE PRONOUNCED A DAME

rejection.details:
The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours

If you submit future petitions, please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read. This is stated in our terms and conditions: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/terms
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
